RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: danoise [bjorn.nesby@googlemail.com]
RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Duplex Browser
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: Duplex is a collection of scripts that can run on a wide range of hardware, and offer full, bi-directional control of the Renoise mixer/effects/pattern matrix. Creates a new menu 'Duplex' in the global 'Tools' menu.
